title: FS: 20 Graded T206 SLers (including Coles Hindu)
author: MVSNYC

posts.post_title: FS: 20 Graded T206 SLers (including Coles Hindu)
posts.post_content:
Selling these only as a group. Represented here is almost half of the SL subset. very clean examples, all graded, mostly 2's & 3's...including several Old Mills and a very tuff Coles w/ Hindu back.

Too many scans to post here, so please PM your email address, and i'll send scans of all fronts & backs.

SOLD

Thanks!
MS
